column1: Please kindly keep in mind that Apple guidelines require rectangular shape of the sign-in button. We strongly recommend to make the appropriate changes in Login Buttons Shape setting.
column2: Please kindly keep in mind that Apple guidelines require rectangular shape of the sign-in button. We strongly recommend to make the appropriate changes in Login Buttons Shape setting.

column1: Additional Social Login package is not installed or need to be updated. Please, run the following command in the SSH: composer require hybridauth/hybridauth:~3.8.0
